1.definition: performance of the essential terms of a contract, promise, or obligation [a contractor is not entitled to a lien in the absence of", 642 So. 2d 766 (1994)"]

2 a.definition: what is required to be performed in fulfillment of a contract, promise, or obligation [substituted a new in novation of the contract]

sub_terms.b: the fulfillment of a contract, promise, or obligation

2.definition: a doctrine which permits a party (as a builder) that acted in good faith to recover from the other party to a contract for a performance that departs in minor respects from what was promised compareat

3.definition: a public rendition or presentation of an artistic work
